description: For the founder of Blue Bottle Coffee, renovating a home wasnâ€™t much different from designing a cafe: Clean lines and white surfaces would do just fine.
title: A Minimalist Take on Queen Anne Style
title_page: A Minimalist Take on Queen Anne Style - The New York Times
text: James and Caitlin Freeman bought an 1894 Queen Anne-style two-family house in the Alamo Square neighborhood of San Francisco. They sold the lower apartment and hired Bohlin Cywinski Jackson to renovate the top two floors into a 3,500-square-foot home for their growing family.
